home.mainTitle: Swispy -- Mini Sweets for Every Occasion
home.tagline: Mini sweets for your special moments. Elegant boxes, innovative flavors, coming soon to your hands!
home.introText: We believe the little details make the biggest difference. That's why we launched Swispy - mini sweets with creative flavors and beautiful packaging, perfect for gifting or indulging. Coming soon - order directly from our website or via WhatsApp. Stay tuned!
home.miniDessertsDesc: Elegant mini desserts crafted for your special moments
home.description: Elegant mini sweets, carefully crafted for your special moments

products.beFirst: Be the First to Experience Swispy

story.title: Our Story
story.text: Swispy started when we saw a gap in the market for elegant, mini-sized desserts. We wanted to create something unique, suitable for all occasions - a gift, a gathering, or a moment of joy. We're currently testing and perfecting every detail, because every moment - and every sweet - matters to us.
story.ideaDesc: We noticed a gap in the market for elegant, mini-sized desserts
story.visionDesc: Create something unique for all occasions - gifts, gatherings, joy
story.processDesc: Currently testing and perfecting every detail with care
story.promiseDesc: Every moment and every sweet matters to us
story.journeyDesc: Every customer becomes part of our journey. Follow us to see behind-the-scenes content, recipe development, and be the first to try our creations.

contact.familyDesc: We can't wait to share our sweet creations with you. Follow our journey and be part of the Swispy family!

share.title: Share Your Swispy Moment!
